item.title: 日经新闻》称日本本田有望在北美推出售价低于 3 万美元的电动汽车
item.description: 日本《日经新闻》周二称，日本本田汽车公司计划最早于2026年在北美推出一款售价低于3万美元的小型电动汽车，以在电池动力汽车市场迎头赶上。【原文：Japan's Honda Motor plans to launch a small electric vehicle priced below $30,000 in North America by as early as 2026, the Nikkei newspaper said on Tuesday, as it plays catch-up in the battery-powered car market.】

item.title: 谷歌告诉欧盟法院，创纪录的 45 亿美元欧盟罚款是对其创新的惩罚
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司周二向欧洲最高法院表示，七年前欧盟对谷歌处以 43 亿欧元（45 亿美元）的创纪录反垄断罚款，是对这家科技巨头创新能力的惩罚，该公司要求法官撤销欧盟的决定。【原文：A record EU antitrust fine of 4.3-billion-euro ($4.5 billion) imposed on Google seven years ago punished the tech giant over its innovation, the Alphabet unit told Europe's top court on Tuesday, as it asked judges to scrap the EU decision.】

item.title: 据消息人士称，汉莎航空正在与欧洲航空商谈收购少数股权事宜
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，德国汉莎航空公司（Lufthansa）正在与西班牙航空公司欧洲航空（Air Europa）就收购少数股权的可能性进行谈判。【原文：German airline group Lufthansa is in talks with Spanish carrier Air Europa about the possibility of acquiring a minority stake, according to two sources with knowledge of the talks.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴蔡崇信支持的公司收购意大利奢侈运动鞋制造商金鹅公司 12% 的股份
item.description: 由阿里巴巴联合创始人蔡崇信（Joe Tsai）支持的香港投资公司蓝池（Blue Pool）周二表示，已收购意大利奢侈运动鞋制造商金鹅（Golden Goose）12%的股份。【原文：Blue Pool, a Hong Kong-based investment firm backed by Alibaba co-founder Joe Tsai, has bought a 12% stake in Italian luxury sneaker maker Golden Goose, the Venice-based brand said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 德国工业游说团（BDI）称德国深陷经济危机
item.description: 德国 BDI 工业协会周二表示，德国正深陷经济危机，预计 2025 年国内生产总值将萎缩 0.1%。【原文：Germany is in a deep economic crisis, Germany's BDI industry association said on Tuesday, forecasting a 0.1% contraction in gross domestic product in 2025.】

item.title: Mediobanca 董事会开会讨论收购事宜，MPS 股价进一步下滑
item.description: 周二，Mediobanca 董事会聚集在一起讨论这家规模较小的竞争对手出人意料的出价，Monte dei Paschi 的股票进一步下跌，这是意大利银行业一系列收购风波中的最新举措。【原文：Shares in Monte dei Paschi fell further on Tuesday as the board of Mediobanca gathered to discuss a surprise bid by the smaller rival, the latest move in a series of takeover tussles rattling Italian banking.】

item.title: 育碧将关闭英国分部并重组其他三个分部，185 名员工将受影响
item.description: 法国最大的视频游戏制造商育碧公司周二表示，将关闭其在英国的莱明顿工厂，并重组育碧杜塞尔多夫工厂、育碧斯德哥尔摩工厂和育碧映像工厂的业务，这将影响到 185 名员工，证实了此前媒体的报道。【原文：France's largest video game maker Ubisoft will close its Leamington site in Britain and restructure operations at Ubisoft Düsseldorf, Ubisoft Stockholm and Ubisoft Reflections, impacting 185 employees, it said on Tuesday, confirming earlier media reports.】

item.title: 独家：备忘录显示，汇丰将缩减欧洲、英国和美洲的并购和企业内容管理能力
item.description: 周二的一份备忘录显示，作为投资银行业务重大调整的一部分，汇丰银行正准备关闭其在欧洲、英国和美洲的并购和股票资本市场业务。【原文：HSBC is preparing to wind down its M&A and equity capital markets businesses in Europe, the UK and the Americas as part of a major shake-up of its investment banking operations, a memo showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 应对特朗普关税威胁，台湾称芯片业务是 "双赢 "之举
item.description: 针对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发出的关税威胁，台湾经济部周二表示，台湾和美国之间的半导体业务具有高度互补性，对双方来说都是 "双赢 "模式。【原文：Semiconductor business between Taiwan and the United States is a "win-win" model for both sides given the high level of complementarity, the island's economy ministry said on Tuesday responding to tariff threats from U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 瓦克化学核心利润因价格下降和能源成本高企而下降
item.description: 德国化学公司瓦克化学周二报告称，其年度核心利润同比下降了 7%，原因是价格和销量下降，特别是太阳能级多晶硅的价格和销量下降，以及德国能源成本居高不下。【原文：German chemical company Wacker Chemie reported a 7% fall year-on-year in its annual core profit on Tuesday, citing lower prices and sales volumes, particularly for solar-grade polysilicon, as well as high energy costs in Germany.】

item.title: 欧洲银行或难再现年末强劲表现
item.description: 欧洲银行预计将公布去年最后三个月的利润大幅增长，这主要得益于贷款利润率依然强劲以及投资银行业务收入大增。【原文：European banks are expected to report a sharp rise in profits for the final three months of last year, helped by still-robust margins from lending and bumper investment banking revenues.】

item.title: 范围》称，德国必须解决结构性弱点才能保持 AAA 评级
item.description: 欧洲评级机构 Scope Ratings 执行董事 Eiko Sievert 在接受路透社采访时说，德国要想长期保持 AAA 信用评级，就必须克服结构性弱点。【原文：Germany needs to overcome its structural weaknesses if it wants to keep its AAA credit rating in the long term, Eiko Sievert, executive director at European ratings agency, Scope Ratings, told Reuters in an interview.】

item.title: 费城全食超市工人投票成立工会
item.description: 周一，宾夕法尼亚州费城全食超市一家旗舰店的大多数工人投票决定成立工会，成为亚马逊旗下食品连锁店中第一个取得劳工胜利的连锁店。【原文：A majority of workers at a flagship Whole Foods store in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania voted to unionize on Monday, becoming the first in the Amazon-owned grocery chain to snatch a labor victory.】

item.title: 美国科技股暴跌凸显市场依赖巨头的风险
item.description: 一些最大科技公司的动荡提醒投资者，美国股市创纪录的涨势面临一个主要风险：依赖少数几家巨型公司推动股市上涨。【原文：Turbulence in some of the biggest tech names is reminding investors of one of the major risks to the U.S. stock market's record-setting rally: Reliance on a handful of mammoth companies to power those gains.】

item.title: 前政策制定者称，日本央行将在 7 月前再次加息，最终有望将利率上调至 1.5
item.description: 日本央行前董事会成员樱井诚（Makoto Sakurai）周二表示，日本央行可能会在6月或7月左右再次加息，并寻求在未来两年内将政策利率至少上调至1.5%。【原文：The Bank of Japan will likely raise interest rates again around June or July, and seek to hike its policy rate to at least 1.5% in the next two years, former BOJ board member Makoto Sakurai said on Tuesday.】

item.title: OpenAI 要求印度法院驳回图书出版商在版权争夺战中提出的质疑
item.description: 法律文件显示，代表印度和全球图书出版商的一个团体指控 OpenAI 侵犯版权，OpenAI 辩称其 ChatGPT 服务只是传播公共信息，OpenAI 已要求印度法院撤销该团体的诉状。【原文：OpenAI has asked an Indian court to quash a plea by a group representing Indian and global book publishers that accuse it of copyright breaches, arguing its ChatGPT service only disseminates public information, legal papers show.】

item.title: 早间竞标美国例外论也有反面
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 史密斯菲尔德食品公司首次公开募股价格低于区间，美国市场卷土重来
item.description: 美国最大的猪肉加工商史密斯菲尔德食品公司（Smithfield Foods）表示，其首次公开募股的定价远低于预期范围，为公司和卖方股东筹集了 5.217 亿美元。【原文：Smithfield Foods, the largest pork processor in the U.S., said it priced its initial public offering well below its forecast range, raising $521.7 million for the company and the selling stockholder.】

item.title: 美国人工智能公司试图戳穿具有颠覆性的 DeepSeek
item.description: 美国领先的人工智能公司的开发人员在称赞 DeepSeek 人工智能模型崭露头角的同时，也试图戳穿这样一种说法，即他们价值数十亿美元的技术已被中国一家新公司的低成本替代品所取代。【原文：Developers at leading U.S. AI firms are praising the DeepSeek AI models that have leapt into prominence while also trying to poke holes in the notion that their multi-billion dollar technology has been bested by a Chinese newcomer's low-cost alternative.】

item.title: 共和党州检察官施压好市多放弃多元化政策
item.description: 19 位共和党总检察长呼吁好市多批发公司放弃其多元化、公平和包容政策，理由是担心歧视和法律风险。【原文：Nineteen Republican attorneys general have called on Costco Wholesale to abandon its diversity, equity, and inclusion policies, citing concerns about discrimination and legal risks.】

item.title: 特朗普的铜、铝关税可能会提高美国消费者的成本
item.description: 分析师和行业消息人士周二表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普誓言对美国进口铜和铝征收关税，将导致当地消费者的成本上升，原因是国内产量不足，而且需要很长时间才能实现产业更新。【原文：President Donald Trump's vow of tariffs on U.S. copper and aluminium imports would result in higher costs for local consumers because of a shortfall of domestic production and the length of time it would take to renew the industry, analysts and industry sources said on Tuesday.】

item.title: DeepSeek 引发人工智能反思，科技股跌势加剧
item.description: 日本科技股周二下跌，中国低成本人工智能模式的出现引发的全球市场溃败已进入第二天，投资者对人工智能风向标公司的天价估值和主导地位提出质疑。【原文：Japanese technology shares fell on Tuesday as a global market rout sparked by the emergence of a low-cost Chinese artificial intelligence model entered day two, with investors questioning the sky-high valuation and dominance of AI bellwethers.】

item.title: 信中显示，"捕食者 "无人机制造商要求马斯克的国家航空航天局（DOGE）削减五角大楼的繁文缛节
item.description: 路透社审阅的一封信显示，一家领先的国防制造商要求特朗普政府改革五角大楼的合同体系，称其过于缓慢和官僚，无法应对来自中国和伊朗的威胁。【原文：A leading defense manufacturer has asked the Trump administration to reform the Pentagon's contracting system, saying it was too slow and bureaucratic to combat threats from China and Iran, a letter reviewed by Reuters showed.】

item.title: OpenAI 首席执行官阿尔特曼称 DeepSeek 的 R1 模型 "令人印象深刻
item.description: OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-阿尔特曼（Sam Altman）周一称中国初创公司 DeepSeek 的 R1 人工智能模型 "令人印象深刻"，但强调 OpenAI 相信更强大的计算能力是他们成功的关键。【原文：OpenAI CEO Sam Altman called Chinese startup DeepSeek's R1 AI model "impressive" on Monday, but emphasized that OpenAI believes greater computing power was key to their own success.】

item.title: 中国数据疲软加剧需求担忧，油价维持在两周低点附近
item.description: 周二，油价在两周低点附近徘徊，此前中国经济数据疲软，其他地区天气预报转暖，令需求前景黯淡。【原文：Oil prices hovered near a two-week low on Tuesday after weak economic data from China and warming weather forecasts elsewhere soured the demand outlook.】

item.title: 交易员评估 DeepSeek 和关税担忧，汇市震荡不安
item.description: 周二，日元回吐了部分避险收益，原因是投资者正努力应对一家中国初创公司免费开源人工智能模型的潜在影响，而新的关税威胁则令欧元走低。【原文：The Japanese yen gave up some of the safe-haven driven gains on Tuesday as investors grappled with the potential implications of a Chinese startup's free open-source artificial intelligence model, while fresh tariff threats had the euro on the back foot.】

item.title: 特朗普称微软正在洽谈收购 TikTok
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一告诉记者，微软正在洽谈收购 TikTok，他希望看到就该应用展开竞购战。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump told reporters on Monday that Microsoft is in talks to acquire TikTok and that he would like to see a bidding war over the app.】

item.title: 中国万科高层调整后港股股价攀升
item.description: 中国万科（China Vanke）高层人事变动加强了政府对该公司控制流动性风险的支持。【原文：Property developer China Vanke's Hong Kong shares firmed on Tuesday following a change of top management that reinforced government support for the company to contain its liquidity risks.】

item.title: 黑人品牌敦促美国消费者不要因 Target 停止多元化努力而抵制它
item.description: 请不要抵制塔吉特：这是黑人创始人和有影响力的人向消费者发出的信息，他们反对零售商终止其多样性、公平性和包容性努力的决定。【原文：Please don't boycott Target : That's the message from Black founders and influencers to consumers about a blacklash against the retailer's decision to end its diversity, equity and inclusion efforts.】

item.title: DeepSeek 的低成本模型引发澳大利亚人工智能股震荡
item.description: 澳大利亚受人工智能浪潮影响的股票周二大幅下跌，因为投资者担心中国初创公司 DeepSeek 推出的低成本人工智能模型会威胁到当前市场领导者的主导地位。【原文：Australian stocks that are exposed to the artificial intelligence wave fell sharply on Tuesday as investors feared the emergence of a low-cost AI model from Chinese startup DeepSeek would threaten the dominance of current market leaders.】
